gurmukhi: jYsy Gr lwgY Awig Bwig inksq Kwn pRIqm prosI Dwie jrq buJwveI
transliteration: Jaisay Ghar Laagai Aagi Bhaagi Nikasat Khaana , Preetam Parosee Dhaai Jarat Bujhaavaee ?
translation: As the owner of the house that catches fire escapes from the inferno to save his life, but sympathetic neighbours and friends rush to put the fire off,

gurmukhi: goDn hrq jYsy krq pUkwr gop gwau mY guhwr lwig qurq CfwveI
transliteration: Godhan Harat Jaisay Karat Pookaar Gopa , Gaau Mai Guhaar Laagi Turat Chhadaavaee ?
translation: As a herdsman shouts for help when his cattle are being stolen, the village folks chase the thieves and recover the cattle,

gurmukhi: bUfq AQwh jYsy pRbl p√çwh ibKY pyKq pYraUAw vwr pwr lY lgwveI
transliteration: Boodat Adaah Jaisay Prabal Pravaah Bikhai , Paykhat Pairaooaa Vaar Paar Lai Lagaavaee ?
translation: As a person may be drowning in rapid and deep water and an expert swimmer rescues him and reaches him on the other bank to safety,

gurmukhi: qYsy AMq kwl jm jwl kwl ibAwl gRsy gurisK swD sMq sMkt imtwvhI ]167]
transliteration: Taisay Ant Kaal Jam Jaal Kaal Biaal Grasay , Gursikh Saadh Sant Sankat Mitaavahee ?167?
translation: Similarly, when death-like snake is entangling a person in the throes of death, seeking help of saintly and holy persons allay that distress. (167)
